bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
$ kinit ellert@FEDORAPROJECT.ORG Password for ellert@FEDORAPROJECT.ORG: $ arm-koji build --scratch f25 root-6.08.02-1.fc25.src.rpm Warning: no configuration for profile name: arm Kerberos authentication failed: Server not found in Kerberos database (-1765328377)
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable):
# rpm -q --whatprovides /usr/bin/arm-koji fedora-packager-0.6.0.0-1.fc25.noarch
# rpm -q fedora-packager koji fedpkg pyrpkg fedora-packager-0.6.0.0-1.fc25.noarch koji-1.11.0-1.fc25.noarch fedpkg-1.26-4.fc25.noarch pyrpkg-1.47-6.fc25.noarch
How reproducible:
Always
Steps to Reproduce: 1. See above
Actual results: Failure (see above)
Expected results: Scratch build started
Additional info:
The same operation on the main koji works:
$ koji build --scratch f25 root-6.08.02-1.fc25.src.rpm Uploading srpm: root-6.08.02-1.fc25.src.rpm [====================================] 100% 00:01:46 151.30 MiB 1.43 MiB/secc Created task: 16989628 Task info: https://koji.fedoraproject.org/koji/taskinfo?taskID=16989628 Watching tasks (this may be safely interrupted)...
